meanings.definition: Clothes made from fabric suitable for making suits.
meanings.sent1: She picked out the finest suitings for her new business attire.
meanings.sent2: The tailor displayed a wide selection of suitings for the customer to choose from.
meanings.sent3: The fashion show featured suitings in all colors of the rainbow.
meanings.sent4: Her wardrobe was a treasure trove of elegant suitings.
meanings.sent5: The soft touch of the suitings against his skin made him feel confident and stylish.

meanings.definition: The act of providing someone with a suit or suits.
meanings.sent1: The company offered free suitings to all employees attending the conference.
meanings.sent2: He was grateful for the generous suitings provided by the charity organization.
meanings.sent3: The surprise gift of new suitings brought a smile to his face.
meanings.sent4: She excelled in the art of personalized suitings for her clients.
meanings.sent5: The tailor's shop was known for its impeccable suitings and excellent service.

meanings.definition: The materials used for making suits.
meanings.sent1: The designer carefully selected the finest suitings for the upcoming collection.
meanings.sent2: The factory imported high-quality suitings from overseas suppliers.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought the suitings left on the table were the perfect napping spot.
meanings.sent4: His creativity knew no bounds when working with different suitings.
meanings.sent5: The scent of new suitings filled the room, inspiring the tailor to create masterpieces.
